content:
Hi, Iâ€™m prototyping the new standard for AI workflow and to me it would be natural to use the FHIRcast hub as a proxy to the ai-workflow-orchestrator.
That way the clients could create requests and receive updates the same way they handle other desktop workflow/integration messages. They would also be informed on AI requests made by other apps and receive update (if they chose to subscribe to those events.
If you are working on the same or know someone who is, please reach out to me. It would be nice to make a proposal to add those events with more than one viewpoint.
ai_workflow_with_FHIRcast.jpg
